name: Age of Fear: The Quest for Immortality Expansion
detailed_description:
Talnes, an aspiring alchemist, always wanted to be a hero. With an ancient tome stolen from his master, he embarks on a journey to find the secret of eternal youth. What kind of challenges await our heroes? Will Talnes reach his goal or be consumed by ancient beasts?

Welcome to the Age of Fear: The Undead King expansion - The Quest for Immortality! This expansion can be played along with original Age of Fear campaigns.

FEATURE LIST

⭐NEW HERO with new skills and tactics!

⭐NEW SCENARIOS and challenges which have to be played in order to win powerful prizes!

⭐POWERFUL RELIC which awaits at the end of the expansion!
